home.title:

home.description: I am a Full Stack Developer, passionate about technology and building functional applications. This website brings together some of my main projects and experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Here are some of my characteristics and the tools I use
about.description: I am a Full Stack Software Developer with experience in building modern and scalable web applications, working both on the development of efficient and responsive interfaces and on the implementation of solid, well-structured backends. I enjoy combining logic and creativity to create functional, organized solutions focused on user experience. I see programming as a tool to solve real problems and transform needs into products through technology.

backend.title: Back-End
backend.description: I work on back-end development, creating APIs, services, and integrations that support modern applications.

frontend.title: Front-End
frontend.description: I develop modern and responsive interfaces, always prioritizing usability, performance, and visual quality.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Get to know some of the technologies I use in my projects

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover some of the personal and professional projects I have created
